member.name: T:MyToolkit.Data.UndoRedoManager
member.summary: Manages undo/redo for a object. Only classes which inherit from GraphObservableObject and properties which are changed via the Set method or raise are tracked for undo/redo. Properties must have an accessible setter. Collection must inherit from INotifyCollectionChanged for undo/redo of collection changes. The class is not thread-safe; all methods must be called on the UI thread.

member.name: M:MyToolkit.Data.UndoRedoManager.Reset
member.summary: Removes all tracked changes and resets the restore point and current index.

member.name: M:MyToolkit.Data.UndoRedoManager.Undo
member.summary: Reverts the last action.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the undo could be performed.

member.name: M:MyToolkit.Data.UndoRedoManager.Redo
member.summary: Repeats the last reverted action.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the redo could be performed.

member.name: M:MyToolkit.Data.UndoRedoManager.CreateRestorePoint
member.summary: Sets the restore point to the current index.

member.name: M:MyToolkit.Data.UndoRedoManager.RevertToRestorePoint
member.summary: Reverts back to the last saved restore point (or to the initial state of the root object).

member.name: M:MyToolkit.Data.UndoRedoManager.Revert(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reverts back to the given index.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the last action can be reverted.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the last reverted action can be repeated.
